docs.lead_paragraph: BERKELEY, Calif. THIS is where it all began, the caldron in which the dark brew of student discontent first spilled over five years ago. It is the best place to try to discover what came of the bold young dreams and what Berkeley's experience signifies for all of higher education.

headline.main: Where it all began--; Berkeley, 5 Years Later, Is Radicalized, Reaganized, Mesmerized

docs.abstract: A H Raskin article discusses Berkeley campus scene 5 yrs after start of Free Speech Movement; says admrs, profs and students feel campus has not necessarily improved as result of student agitation; notes profs believe left-wing disruption has given conservative pol forces under Gov Reagan open door to punish univ; cites former univ pres Kerr's belief that very little has changed at Berkeley; illus
